subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Johnny Boychuk, a 31-year-old defenseman acquired just before the season opener, brings a booming slap shot, veteran leadership and a sly sense of humor to the first-place Islanders.
snippet: Johnny Boychuk, a 31-year-old defenseman acquired just before the season opener, brings a booming slap shot, veteran leadership and a sly sense of humor to the first-place Islanders.
